/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.currproc.service.impl.CurrProcMapper.listsubjectSeach ====== */
select sub.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE AS subjectTraningType, sub.YYYY AS yyyy, sub.TERM AS term, sub.SUBJECT_CODE AS subjectCode, sub.CLASS AS subClass, sub.SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName, sub.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, sub.ONLINE_TYPE AS onlineType, ( select count(*) from lms_traning_process_mapping where delete_yn = 'N' and yyyy = sub.yyyy and term = sub.term and subject_code = sub.subject_code and class = sub.class ) as traningMappingCnt from lms_subject sub where 1 = 1 and sub.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = #{subjectTraningType} and sub.DELETE_YN = 'N'

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.currproc.service.impl.CurrProcMapper.listCotMappingTrainSubjectDetail ====== */
select a.SUBJ_TUT_MAPPING_ID, a.YYYY, a.TERM, a.SUBJECT_CODE, a.CLASS as subClass, a.MEM_SEQ, a.DELETE_YN, FN_GETUSERNAME(a.MEM_SEQ) MEM_NAME, FN_GETSUBJECT_NAME(a.YYYY,a.TERM,a.SUBJECT_CODE,a.CLASS) SUBJECT_NAME, FN_GETTRANING_PROCESS_NAME(b.TRANING_PROCESS_ID) HRD_TRANING_NAME, FN_GETDEPARTMENT_NAME(a.YYYY,a.TERM,a.SUBJECT_CODE,a.CLASS) AS DEPARTMENT_NAME from lms_subj_tut_mapping a left outer join lms_traning_process_mapping b on b.YYYY = a.YYYY and b.TERM = a.TERM and b.SUBJECT_CODE = a.SUBJECT_CODE and b.CLASS = a.CLASS and b.DELETE_YN = 'N' and b.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} where 1 = 1 and a.MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} and a.DELETE_YN = 'N' order by a.insert_date desc

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.currproc.service.impl.CurrProcMapper.getMySubjectInfo ====== */ select sub.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE AS subjectTraningType, CASE WHEN sub.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' THEN 'OJT' ELSE 'Off-JT' END SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE_NAME, sub.YYYY AS yyyy, sub.TERM AS term, sub.SUBJECT_CODE AS subjectCode, sub.CLASS AS subClass, sub.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, sub.SUBJECT_NAME AS subjectName, sub.GRADE AS grade, sub.POINT_USE_YN AS pointUseYn, CASE WHEN sub.POINT_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN '학점' WHEN sub.POINT_USE_YN = 'N' THEN '비학점' END pointUseYnName, sub.POINT AS point, sub.SUBJECT_TYPE AS subjectType, sub.ONLINE_TYPE AS onlineType,
CASE WHEN sub.SUBJECT_TYPE = 'NORMAL' THEN '학부' ELSE '고숙련' END SUBJECT_TYPE_NAME,
sub.FIRST_STUDY_YN, sub.GRADE_RATIO,
(SELECT LISTAGG(FN_GETUSERNAME(INS.MEM_SEQ), ',') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY FN_GETUSERNAME(INS.MEM_SEQ)) FROM LMS_SUBJ_INS_MAPPING INS WHERE INS.YYYY = sub.YYYY AND INS.TERM = sub.TERM AND INS.SUBJECT_CODE = sub.SUBJECT_CODE AND INS.CLASS = sub.CLASS ) AS INS_NAMES,
CASE WHEN sub.ONLINE_TYPE IN ('104','105') THEN '플립러닝' WHEN sub.ONLINE_TYPE = '101' THEN '순수온라인' WHEN sub.ONLINE_TYPE = '102' THEN '브렌디드' WHEN sub.ONLINE_TYPE = '103' THEN '보조활용' ELSE '없음'
END onlineTypeName, CASE WHEN sub.ONLINE_TYPE = 'FLIPPED' THEN '필수' ELSE '미필수' END firstLecLessionAt, (select b.mem_name from lms_subj_ins_mapping a, com_member b where YYYY = #{yyyy} and TERM = #{term} and SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} and CLASS = #{subClass} and a.MEM_SEQ = b.mem_seq AND ROWNUM = 1 ) memName from lms_subject sub where 1 = 1 and sub.YYYY = #{yyyy} and sub.TERM = #{term} and sub.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} and sub.CLASS = #{subClass}
and sub.DELETE_YN = 'N'

/* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.currproc.service.impl.CurrProcMapper.listNotSubjectWeek ====== */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUBJ.YYYY, SUBJ.TERM, SUBJ.SUBJECT_CODE, SUBJ.CLASS as subClass , SUBJ.SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJ.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS departmentName, CASE WHEN SUBJ.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' THEN 'OJT' ELSE 'Off-JT' END SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE_NAME, CASE WHEN SUBJ.POINT_USE_YN = 'Y' THEN '학점' WHEN SUBJ.POINT_USE_YN = 'N' THEN '비학점' END pointUseYnName, CASE WHEN SUBJ.SUBJECT_TYPE = 'NORMAL' THEN '학부' ELSE '고숙련' END SUBJECT_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LMS_TRANING_SUBJ_WEEK_SCH WEEK WHERE WEEK.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND WEEK.YYYY = SUBJ.YYYY AND WEEK.TERM = SUBJ.TERM AND WEEK.SUBJECT_CODE = SUBJ.SUBJECT_CODE AND WEEK.CLASS = SUBJ.CLASS ) AS CNT FROM LMS_SUBJECT SUBJ WHERE SUBJ.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND SUBJ.YYYY = #{yyyy} AND SUBJ.TERM = #{term} AND SUBJ.SUBJECT_TRANING_TYPE = 'OJT' ) AA WHERE AA.CNT = 0 ORDER BY AA.SUBJECT_CODE , AA.subClass -- 200
